languages.text: {n}Обхватив плечи руками, Идира смотрит на вас взглядом полным отчаянья. Наконец, звенящую тишину разбивает ее абсолютно бесцветный голос.{/n} "Н-но как же так, Лорд-капитан... Я же... Но я же тогда... умру?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Обхватив плечи руками, Идира смотрит на вас взглядом полным отчаянья.{/n} "Н-но как же так, Лорд-капитан... Я же..." {n}Она делает глубокий вдох и выдох.{/n} "Ладно. Хорошо. Но если вдруг передумаете или случайно наткнетесь на что-то похожее... Прошу, дайте знать".

languages.text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"
languages.original_text: {n}Обхватив плечи руками, Идира смотрит на вас взглядом полным отчаянья. Наконец, звенящую тишину разбивает ее абсолютно бесцветный голос.{/n} "Н-но как же так, Лорд-капитан... Я же... Но я же тогда... умру?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair.{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I..." {n}She takes a deep breath, then exhales.{/n} "Fine. That's fine. But if you change your mind or just stumble upon something similar... please, let me know."

{n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair.{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I..." {n}She takes a deep breath, then exhales.{/n} "Fine. That's fine. But if you change your mind or just stumble upon something similar... please, let me know."

{n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉抱着肩膀，以充满绝望的目光看着你。沉默笼罩在了你们两人之中，随后，她以毫无生机的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“可……可是，舰长大人……我……这是不是意味着……我要死了？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉抱着肩膀，以充满绝望的目光看着你。沉默笼罩在了你们两人之中，随后，她以毫无生机的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“可……可是，舰长大人……我……这是不是意味着……我要死了？”

languages.text: {n}Idira se cubre con los brazos y lanza una mirada cargada de desesperación. Se hace el silencio. Después, lo rompe con una voz totalmente apagada:{/n} «P-pero, Lord Capitán... entonces... ¿no significa eso que... voy a morir?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se cubre con los brazos y lanza una mirada cargada de desesperación. Se hace el silencio. Después, lo rompe con una voz totalmente apagada:{/n} «P-pero, Lord Capitán... entonces... ¿no significa eso que... voy a morir?».

languages.text: {n}Idira schlingt die Arme um sich und blickt dich mit verzweifelten Augen an. Es herrscht Schweigen. Doch dann wird die Stille von ihrer vollkommen lebloser Stimme zertrümmert:{/n} "A-Aber, Lord Captain ... Ich ... Heißt das nicht ... dass ich sterben werde?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schlingt die Arme um sich und blickt dich mit verzweifelten Augen an. Es herrscht Schweigen. Doch dann wird die Stille von ihrer vollkommen lebloser Stimme zertrümmert:{/n} "A-Aber, Lord Captain ... Ich ... Heißt das nicht ... dass ich sterben werde?"

languages.text: {n}イディラは自分を抱きしめ、絶望に満ちた目であなたを見つめた。静寂が訪れる。そしてそれは、まったく生気のない彼女の声によって打ち砕かれる。{/n}「で、でもロード・キャプテン…それはつまり…あたいは死ぬっていうことじゃない？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは自分を抱きしめ、絶望に満ちた目であなたを見つめた。静寂が訪れる。そしてそれは、まったく生気のない彼女の声によって打ち砕かれる。{/n}「で、でもロード・キャプテン…それはつまり…あたいは死ぬっていうことじゃない？」

languages.text: {n}Idira se frictionne et vous jette un regard empli de désespoir, puis le silence s'installe avant d'être rompu par sa voix atone :{/n} « M-mais, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Je... Cela ne signifie-t-il pas que... je vais mourir ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se frictionne et vous jette un regard empli de désespoir, puis le silence s'installe avant d'être rompu par sa voix atone :{/n} « M-mais, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Je... Cela ne signifie-t-il pas que... je vais mourir ? »

languages.text: {n}İdira, kollarını kendine sarıp çaresizlikle dolu gözlerle sana bakıyor. Sessizlik derinleşiyor. Sonrasında İdira'nın tamamıyla donuk sesi, sessizliği bölüyor.{/n} "Fakat Lord Kaptan... Ben... Bu öleceğim anlamına gelmez mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hugs herself and looks at you with eyes filled with despair. Silence falls. Then it is shattered by her utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "B-but, Lord Captain... I... Doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira kollarını kendine sarıyor ve çaresizlikle dolu gözlerle sana bakıyor. Sessizlik derinleşiyor. Sonra İdira'nın tamamıyla donuk sesiyle bölünüyor:{/n} "Fakat Lord Kaptan... Ben... Bu öleceğim anlamına gelmez mi?"
